alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 10 at 3:28PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rainfall continues to be possible WHERE...all islands WHEN...Through Saturday Morning IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause ponding on the roadways and rapidly rising streams throughout the territory. Be prepared for heavy rainfall, which may be slow moving. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The South Pacific Convergence Zone (SPCZ) to the south will produce heavy rain at times over the islands and its vicinity. A ridge extending from the east will push the SPCZ to the south southwest on Saturday. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 327 Aoauli Aso Faraile Mati 10 2023 ...O LOO FAAAUAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE TAEAO ASO TOANA`I... MAFUAAGA...E ono faatupulaia lologa ma tafega mai timuga mamafa NOFOAGA...Motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le taeao Aso Toana`i AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai on lolovaia ai luga o auala tele. E tatau ona e fa`alogologo pea i tala o le tau ma nofo sauniuni mo ni lapata`iga o tafega ma lologa e tu`u atu. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O Fetaulaiga o Savili o le Pasefika i Saute o loo i saute o le atunuu o le a tutupu ai timuga mamafa i luga mo nai isi aso. O vaega o peau mamafa o le ea o loo i sasa`e o le a tuleia nei uiga louloua o le tau i saute, i le Aso Toana`i. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
